00002 ! MODULE: random_number_generator_p

00094 module random_number_generator_p
00095 
00096 
00097         private ! default all module variables to be local within module routines
00098 
00099         ! 64-bit real and integers (could make available to transport routines)
00100         integer, parameter :: R8 = selected_real_kind(15,307)
00101         integer, parameter :: I8 = selected_int_kind(18)
00102 
00103         ! Public functions and subroutines for this module
00104         public ::  rand                   ! Gives a uniform random number
00105         public ::  initialize_rng         ! Initialize generator
00106         public ::  initialize_particle    ! New subsequence for a history
00107 
00108         ! Default LCG values
00109   integer(I8), save :: g            =  19073486328125_I8 ! g, 5^19
00110   integer(I8), save :: c            =               0_I8 ! c = 0
00111   integer(I8), save :: Stride       =          152917_I8 ! default stride
00112   integer(I8), save :: S0           =  19073486328125_I8 ! S0, 5^19
00113   integer(I8), save :: TwoToMMinus1 = 281474976710655_I8 ! 2^48 - 1
00114   real(R8),    save :: OneOver2toM  = 1._R8 / 281474976710656._R8 ! 1/2^48
00115 
00116   ! Current seed, needs to be private to a thread
00117   integer(I8), save :: S   = 19073486328125_I8 
00118   !$omp threadprivate ( S )
00119     
00120 contains
00121 
00122 
00123   !============================================================================!
00128   real(R8) function rand()
00129 
00130       implicit none
00131 
00132       S    = iand( iand( g*S, TwoToMMinus1) + c,  TwoToMMinus1 )
00133       rand = S * OneOver2toM 
00134 
00135   end function RandomNum
00136 
00137   !============================================================================!
00146   integer(I8) function RN_skip_ahead( Seed, Skip )
00147 
00148       implicit none
00149       integer(I8), intent(in)  :: Seed, Skip
00150 
00151       ! Local Variables:
00152       integer(I8)              :: nskip, BigG, tmpg, BigC, tmpc, gp, rn, SeedOld
00153 
00154       SeedOld = Seed
00155       nskip = skip
00156       nskip = iand( nskip, TwoToMMinus1 ) ! modulo(nskip,2^M)
00157       BigG  = 1           
00158       tmpg  = g
00159       BigC  = 0
00160       tmpc  = c
00161       do while( nskip .gt. 0_I8 )
00162         if( btest(nskip,0) )  then      ! Checks 0th bit of nskip: 0=even, 1=odd
00163           BigG = iand( BigG*tmpg, TwoToMMinus1 )  
00164           BigC = iand( BigC*tmpg, TwoToMMinus1 )
00165           BigC = iand( BigC+tmpc, TwoToMMinus1 )
00166         end if
00167         gp    = iand( tmpg+1,  TwoToMMinus1 )
00168         tmpg  = iand( tmpg*tmpg,  TwoToMMinus1 )
00169         tmpc  = iand( gp*tmpc, TwoToMMinus1 )
00170         nskip = ishft( nskip, -1 )
00171       end do
00172       rn = iand( BigG*SeedOld, TwoToMMinus1 )
00173       rn = iand( rn + BigC, TwoToMMinus1 )
00174       RN_skip_ahead = rn
00175 
00176   end function RN_skip_ahead
00177 
00178   !============================================================================!
00186   subroutine initialize_rng( UserS, UserStride )
00187 
00188       implicit none
00189 
00190       integer(I8), intent(in) :: UserS
00191       integer(I8), intent(in) :: UserStride
00192 
00193       ! Update defaults if user gives nonzero seed and/or stride
00194       if( UserS .gt. 0_I8 ) then
00195         S0  = UserS
00196       endif
00197       if( UserStride .gt. 0_I8 ) then
00198         Stride = Stride
00199       endif
00200 
00201       ! set the initial particle seed
00202       S  = S0
00203 
00204   end subroutine initialize_rng
00205 
00206   !============================================================================!
00214   subroutine initialize_rng_history(History)
00215 
00216       implicit none
00217       integer(I8), intent(in) :: History
00218       S  = RN_skip_ahead( S0, History*Stride )
00219       return
00220 
00221   end subroutine initialize_rng_history
00222 
00223 end module Random
